title: Documentation
description: The Planerify API is a Python-based backend powering the Planerify. It securely connects to Librus to retrieve and store class schedules and announcements for each class. The system runs daily updates automatically and serves all data to the frontend in JSON format.

authorization_api.authorization_api_desc: The authorization endpoint connects to the Planerify API using a unique API key purchased by the school and utilizes the school's Librus configuration settings. If the key and configuration are valid, the connection is successful; otherwise, an authorization error is returned.
